div.ab: Account for the daily payment of prakroreia in the month Neronios Augustus: 16 - 130 dr; 17 - 260 dr; 18 - 188 dr; 19 - 188 dr; 20 - 96 dr; ; 21 - 102 dr; 22 - 84 dr; 23 - 28 dr; 24 - 60 dr; 27 - 104 dr; 28 - 180 dr; 29 - 68 dr; 30 - 28 dr; total for the month: 1416 dr.;Tubi 1 - 28 dr; 2 - [ ]6 dr; 3 - [ ]; 4 - [ ]; 5 - [ ]; 6- [ ] dr; 7 - [ ] dr; 8 - [ ] dr; 9 - [ ] dr; 10 - [ ] dr; 11 - [ ] 3[ ] dr; 12 - 1[ ] dr; 13 - [ ]dr; total for the month 3[ ] dr.;Mecheir 15 - 8 dr 5 ob; 16 - 2 dr; 17 - [ ] dr 2 1/2 ob; 18 - 193 dr 2 ob; 19 - 102 dr; 20 - 32 dr 5 1/2 ob; 21 - [ ] dr 1 ob; 22 - [ ] dr 1 ob; Total for the month 48[ ] dr. Total 2[ ]8 dr. From these in the bank in the month Neronios Augustus 1040 dr. Similarly, other 500 dr; in Tybi similarly 68 dr; similarly other [ ] dr to the hegoumenos; similarly other [ ] dr; similarly in the 30th other 400 dr. remainder other 100 dr. from the which the expenses.;Another account daily through Petheus, son of Harapaesis, hegoumenos.;Tybi 19 - 28 dr; 20 - 8 dr; 21 - 48 dr; 22 - 8 dr; 23 - 32 dr; 26 - 14 dr 2 ob; 27 - 160 dr; 28 - 400 dr.; 29 - 809 dr 4 ob; 30 - 426 dr; total for the month 1938 dr; Mecheir 1; 1- 167 dr; 2 - 48 dr; 3 - 6 dr 2 ob; 6 - 234 dr 3 ob; 7 - 153 dr - i ob; 8 - 76 dr; 9 - 38 dr 4 ob; 10 - 110 dr; 11 - 58 dr 4 ob; 12 - 24 dr; 24 - 8 dr; total for the month 978 dr.;total 2916 dr of silver dr.;From these in the bank in Tybi similarly 1140 dr. similarly other 880 dr; similarly other 60 dr; similarly other 500 dr; similarly other 40 dr similarly other 72 dr through Harapaesis, son of Pethes. Of these in the bank 5212 dr.;Similarly and through Kotouis, another hegoumenos;Mecheir 25 - 20 dr; 26 - 89 dr 4 1/2 ob; 27 - 240 dr 12 ob; 28 - 108 dr; 29 - 52 dr; 30 - 8 dr; total for the month 519 dr 2 1/2 ob; ;Phamenoth 1 - 24 dr.; 2 - 121 dr 2 ob; 3 - 43 dr; 4 - 130 dr; 5 - 40 dr; total for the month 877 dr 4 1/2 ob; from these in the banl 400 dr. sililarly in the 5 (of the month) other 360 dr . remainder 17 dr 4 1/2/ ob.;Account of thetax paid by the foreigners;Phamenoth 1 ;Harpaesis, from Kerkesoucha 3 dr 3 ob;;Onnophris from Dionysias 3 dr 3 ob;;Onnophris, son of Sambas 4 dr;;Horis, son of Hermas for his son 1 dr 5 ob;;Pases from Nesos 20 ob;Kames for Neilou polis through Petr( ) 4 dr;;Pasion son of Ammonios 4 dr;;Nekpheraus from Bakchias 4 dr;;heron from Taurinos 4 dr;;Epaphras 4 dr.;Ptollion son of Petees 2 dr;;Sokmenis son of Pakysis 4 dr;;Horos son of Satabous from Nesos 8 dr;Account of the weavers through Kotouis;Mecheir 10;account of weavers 28 dr;;[fragmnetary status of about 17 lines];Phamenoth 2;---;weavers;for cutting fowl 3 ob;3 (of the month) similarly another 3 ob;;vegetables dr;;vinegar ob;cheiristikon 1 dr 4 ob;;exchange of 2 stateres 2 ob;;To Heron the mach(etes?) 4 dr;;To Ptolemaios --- for writing the document 8 dr;;--- 5 dr 3 ob;;To Panephremmis the komarch 9 dr;;---;to Hydrophylax 4 dr;to the builder breaking --- 1 dr;;to Papepn( ) the parachytes 1 dr;;to the machaerophoros of the strategos --- 2 1/2/;Expenses for 8 days 4 dr 4 ob;;Pharmouthi 10;Kames from Neilopolis 4 dr
